overview: The referee expelled the "fake boy" Tian Jiao from the arena for imposting him. Xu Ao, who was on the same team, confronted Tian Jiao everywhere, and the contradiction between the two became deeper and deeper. In a group match, Tian Jiao performed a hat-trick. Seeing victory was in sight, Xu Ao scored an own goal. Tian Jiao insisted that Xu Ao deliberately kicked the ball into his own gate. He got the coach’s distrust and became a substitute. In the following series of incidents, the surprising truth surfaced...
title: A Proud Juvenile
